Text: thank you for this download. im a huge peter david fan and love his vision of x factor

you're welcome. it was no problem. i also love peter david's work, from peter parker to incredible hulk to x-factor to aquaman to supergirl to x-factor again. if you've never read spider-man: the death of jean dewolff ... or if you can find them, his photon novels ... you should hunt them down.
